input.natural_language: Loop through an array of fruits and display each one

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:set name="fruits" type="array" value="['apple', 'banana', 'cherry']" />
<q:loop type="array" var="fruit" items="{fruits}">
  {fruit}
</q:loop>
expected_output.runtime_behavior: Iterates over fruits array, outputting each fruit name

input.natural_language: Loop through colors with index numbers

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:set name="colors" type="array" value="['red', 'green', 'blue']" />
<q:loop type="array" var="color" index="idx" items="{colors}">
  {idx}: {color}
</q:loop>
expected_output.runtime_behavior: Iterates with index: '0: red', '1: green', '2: blue'

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:set name="numbers" type="array" value="[10, 20, 30, 40]" />
<q:set name="sum" type="number" value="0" />
<q:loop type="array" var="num" items="{numbers}">
  <q:set name="sum" operation="add" value="{num}" />
</q:loop>
Total: {sum}
